alert.note: Alert for Polk; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:53PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Trinity, northeastern Montgomery, northwestern San Jacinto, west central Polk and southeastern Walker Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 353 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of New Waverly, or 11 miles northeast of Willis, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Onalaska, Coldspring, Point Blank, West Livingston, Evergreen and Oakhurst. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
